means: 平底大船，战舰( galley的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Other people had drowned at sea since galleys swarmed with painted sails.
sentence.Network_cn: 自从布满彩帆的大船下海以来,别的人曾淹死在海里.

sentence.Network_en: He sighed for the galleys, with their infamous costume.
sentence.Network_cn: 他羡慕那些穿着囚衣的苦工.

sentence.Network_en: Its galleys could have penetrated up the rivers to the heart of Russia.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的大木船溯河而上可以深入俄罗斯的腹地.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 背题 bottom line title排版毛条 galleys排版毛坯 type set matter

the clock-tower of what had been their village forgot them , the boundary line of what had been their field forgot them , after a few years residence in the galleys , Jean Valjean himself forgot them .他们乡村里的钟塔忘了他们，他们田地边的界石也忘了他们，冉阿让在监牢里住了几年之后，自己也忘了那些东西。
Jean Valjean was condemned to five years in the galleys ., 冉阿让被宣判服五年苦役.
the potable water system supplies potable water to the galleys and lavatories ., 饮用水系统为机上厨房及卫生间提供饮用水.

entry.def: On a ship or aircraft, the galley is the kitchen.

entry.tran: （旧时常由奴隶或囚犯划桨的）桨帆船
entry.def: In former times, a galley was a ship with sails and a lot of oars, which was often rowed by slaves or prisoners.
